Package com.company.rest.products.test.util

Class TestUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.rest.products.test.util.TestUtil
  • public class TestUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of utilities for unit tests. We leverage jUnit4 assertions.
    See Also:
    ResponseEntity, ResponseMessage, Assert, AssertionError

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TestUtil.UpsertType
      An enum to assist with our testing of specific upsert requests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String CODE_FOR_CATALOG_ITEM_VARIATIONS
      A String that CatalogObject requires to signify that the CatalogObject is actually a wrapper around a CatalogItemVariation instance.

      A String that CatalogObject requires to signify that the CatalogObject is actually a wrapper around a CatalogItem instance.

      A default cost, in cents, for our tests.

      A default product name for our tests.

      A default CatalogItemVariation to use in tests.

      A test-wide constant to assist with mocked tests that need to see a stringified date field in various responses.

      A test-wide constant to assist with mocked tests that need to see a version field in various responses.
      static java.lang.String PRICE_MODEL
      A default pricing model for our tests.

      • flushRepo

        public static void flushRepo​(LiteProductRepository repo)
        Delete all the instances of the LiteProductRepository argument. Useful for testing when using a persistent local database, such as MySQL, PostGres, Mongo, etc
        Parameters:
        repo - The - usually @Autowired LiteProductRepository instance that we want to flush.
        See Also:
        CrudRepository.deleteAll()

      • makeAPost

        public static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> makeAPost​(@NonNull
                                                                                 @NonNull java.lang.String clientProductId,
                                                                                 @NonNull
                                                                                 @NonNull BackendService backendService,
                                                                                 @NonNull
                                                                                 @NonNull ProductController controller)
        Performs a POST request by using the controller but mocking the backend service POST call.
        Parameters:
        clientProductId - The unique product ID provided by the client.
        backendService - A usually @Autowired BackendService instance, whose relevant call will be mocked in this method
        controller - A usually @Autowired ProductController instance, to which we will submit our query.
        Returns:
        An appropriate ResponseEntity.
        See Also:
        makeAPost(String, ProductController)

      • makeAPost

        public static org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> makeAPost​(@NonNull
                                                                                 @NonNull java.lang.String id,
                                                                                 @NonNull
                                                                                 @NonNull ProductController controller)
        Performs a POST request at the level of the controller, but without any mocked services.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique product ID provided by the client.
        controller - A usually @Autowired ProductController instance, instance, to which we will submit our query.
        Returns:
        An appropriate ResponseEntity.
        See Also:
        makeAPost(String, BackendService, ProductController)

      • responseMatchesUpsertRequest

        public static boolean responseMatchesUpsertRequest​(@NonNull
                                                   @NonNull ProductUpsertRequestBody upsertRequestBody,
                                                   @NonNull
                                                   @NonNull ProductResponseBody responseBody,
                                                   @NonNull
                                                   TestUtil.UpsertType upsertType)
        Examines if the fields of the provided ProductResponseBody match those of the provided ProductUpsertRequestBody
        Parameters:
        upsertRequestBody - The POST, PUT or PATCH request information provided by the client.
        responseBody - An instance of ProductResponseBody containing information from the ProductController layer's runtime.
        upsertType - Can be one of TestUtil.UpsertType.POST, TestUtil.UpsertType.PUT or TestUtil.UpsertType.PATCH.
        Returns:
        true if the fields match, false otherwise.

      • responseMatchesUpsertRequest

        public static boolean responseMatchesUpsertRequest​(@NonNull
                                                   @NonNull ProductUpsertRequestBody upsertRequestBody,
                                                   @NonNull
                                                   @NonNull BackendServiceResponseBody responseBody,
                                                   @NonNull
                                                   TestUtil.UpsertType upsertType)
        Examines if the fields of the provided ProductResponseBody match those of the provided BackendServiceResponseBody
        Parameters:
        upsertRequestBody - The POST, PUT or PATCH request information provided by the client.
        responseBody - An instance of BackendServiceResponseBody containing information from the BackendService layer's runtime.
        upsertType - Can be one of TestUtil.UpsertType.POST, TestUtil.UpsertType.PUT or TestUtil.UpsertType.PATCH.
        Returns:
        true if the fields match, false otherwise.

        upsertType - Can be one of TestUtil.UpsertType.POST, TestUtil.UpsertType.PUT or TestUtil.UpsertType.PATCH.

      • buildItemResponseOutOfRequest

        public static com.squareup.square.models.UpsertCatalogObjectResponse buildItemResponseOutOfRequest​(@NonNull
                                                                                                   @NonNull com.squareup.square.models.UpsertCatalogObjectRequest request,
                                                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                                                   @NonNull java.lang.Long version,
                                                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                                                   @NonNull TestUtil.UpsertType type)
        A method useful for tests, where we want to mock CatalogWrapper's calls, which touch entities for CatalogApi. We receive an instance of UpsertCatalogObjectRequest, and construct a UpsertCatalogObjectResponse that represents a successful call to the Square API.
        Parameters:
        request - An UpsertCatalogObjectRequest containing the information given to CatalogWrapper.
        version - The " version " of the CatalogItem of interest. Essential for UPDATE queries.
        type - An TestUtil.UpsertType meant to tell us if we need to include id mapping information in the returned UpsertCatalogObjectResponse. The field id_mappings of that response class is only set for POST requests.
        Returns:
        An instance of UpsertCatalogObjectResponse, usually appropriately formed based on the argument in order to successfully mock a CatalogWrapper call in testing.
        See Also:
        BackendServicePutTests, BackendServiceDeleteTests

      • buildResponseOutOfRetrieveRequest

        public static com.squareup.square.models.RetrieveCatalogObjectResponse buildResponseOutOfRetrieveRequest​(ProductGetRequestBody getRequest)
        Prepare a mocked RetrieveCatalogObjectResponse instance given information from a ProductGetRequestBody instance.
        Parameters:
        getRequest - A ProductGetRequestBody instance.
        Returns:
        An instance of RetrieveCatalogObjectResponse.

      • buildMockedDeleteResponseOutOfRequest

        public static com.squareup.square.models.DeleteCatalogObjectResponse buildMockedDeleteResponseOutOfRequest​(@NonNull
                                                                                                           @NonNull ProductDeleteRequestBody deleteRequest)
        Prepare a mocked DeleteCatalogObjectResponse given information mined from a ProductDeleteRequestBody. Useful for tests.
        Parameters:
        deleteRequest - The ProductDeleteRequestBody instance provided by the user.
        Returns:
        An instance of DeleteCatalogObjectResponse.

      • createSortingStrategies

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Comparator<LiteProduct>> createSortingStrategies​(java.lang.String sortOrder)
        Defines sorting strategies to test pagination.
        Returns:
        A Map that associates fields with appropriate sorting strategies for their type.
        See Also:
        LiteProduct, ControllerGetTests.testGetAll(), BackendServiceGetTests.testGetAll(), EndToEndGetTests.testGetAll()

      • checkPageSuccessor

        public static boolean checkPageSuccessor​(int pageIdx,
                                         int totalPages,
                                         @NonNull
                                         @NonNull org.springframework.data.domain.Page<?> page)
        Checks if the provided Page's successor flag is the expected one.
        Parameters:
        page - An instance of Page.
        pageIdx - The zero-based index of the provided Page in the collection of Pages that paginated the data.
        totalPages - The total number of pages in the pagination.
        Returns:
        true if the successor flag is of the expected state, false otherwise. An "expected" state is one that is true when there should be a successor flag, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        EndToEndGetTests.testGetAll()

      • fieldMonotonic

        public static boolean fieldMonotonic​(org.springframework.data.domain.Page<LiteProduct> page,
                                     java.lang.String sorterField,
                                     java.lang.String sortingOrder)
        Examines if the field provided is monotonically increasing or decreasing.
        Parameters:
        page - An instance of Page .
        sorterField - The field of LiteProduct that will be used to sort the elements of liteProducts
        sortingOrder - \"ASC\" or \"DESC\"
        Returns:
        true if the Page's elements match the provided array's elements 1 - by - 1, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ControllerGetTests.testGetAll(), BackendServiceGetTests.testGetAll(), EndToEndGetTests.testGetAll()

      • getNumElementsInPage

        public static int getNumElementsInPage​(int pageIdx,
                                       int totalPages,
                                       long totalElements)
        Returns the expected number of elements in the current page.
        Parameters:
        pageIdx - The zero-based index of the current page.
        totalPages - The total number of pages in the paginated data.
        totalElements - The total number of data elements.
        Returns:
        The expected number of elements in the current page.

      • mockedPage

        public static org.springframework.data.domain.Page<LiteProduct> mockedPage​(int startElementIdx,
                                                                           int elementsInPage,
                                                                           java.util.List<LiteProduct> liteProducts)
        Mocks a BackendService or LiteProductRepository call to return a pre-defined Page.
        Parameters:
        startElementIdx - The index into the original collection of the element that should begin the Page.
        elementsInPage - The elements that the returned Page should contain.
        liteProducts - The requests to snatch a page from, transformed from instances of ProductUpsertRequestBody into LiteProduct instances.
        Returns:
        A mocked Page.

      • toyLiteProduct

        public static LiteProduct toyLiteProduct​(ProductUpsertRequestBody request)
        Transform a ProductUpsertRequestBody instance into a LiteProduct instance. Used extensively by GET ALL tests.
        Parameters:
        request - An instance of ProductUpsertRequestBody
        Returns:
        An instance of LiteProduct
